Map by Scarifice [Fr]

This is a multigame map (as mg_hellz_multigame, tron_v2 or fun_allinone_css...).

They have 5 minigame in the map for the moment :

- A knife battle in a big maze (with one gun in the middle of the maze and mines)

- A shotguns battle in the dark (with explosive barrels and mini maze)

- A climb level (1'30 min to climb or autogive knifes)

- A M-249 battle in a winter area

- A knife battle in a radioactive dock


Of course there is an anticamp potection in the selection area.

Enjoy ! =)

(3,8 Mo in .bsp)


And don't forget that the version 2 is better, download it :
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/125111
